thread.section_title: Novotel Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Gorgeous hotel. Close to everything.
thread.title_full: Gorgeous hotel. Close to everything. - Review of Novotel Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Emily M
title: Gorgeous hotel. Close to everything.
text:
The staff always say hello & goodbye as we come & go. Our room is beautiful & we have a lovely view of the Eiffel Tower; this is especially beautiful in the evening when the tower sparkles every hour!
Great value for money & is next door to a tube station, meaning it's easy to get to places & easy to get back on a evening!
Loving our stay! We don't want to go home!
